Bias = 2^(4-1)-1 = 8-1 = 7
Characteristic = Bias + Exponent



(-43.3652)_10_

43/2 = 21 R 1
21/2 = 10 R 1
10/2 =  5 R 0
5/2  =  2 R 1
2/2  =  1 R 0
1/2  =  0 R 1

0.3652*2 = 0.7304
0.7304*2 = 1.4608
0.4608*2 = 0.9216
0.9216*2 = 1.8432
0.8432*2 = 1.6862
0.6862*2 = 1.3724
0.3724*2 = 0.

(-101011.0101110)_2_

-101011.0101110 = -0.1010110101110*2^6
Char = 6+7 = 13
13/2 = 6 R 1
6/2  = 3 R 0
3/2  = 1 R 1
1/2  = 0 R 1

(1|1101|01011010111)_ieee_



(105.8523)_10_
105/2 = 52 R 1
52/2  = 26 R 0
26/2  = 13 R 0
13/2  =  6 R 1
6/2   =  3 R 0
3/2   =  1 R 1
1/2   =  0 R 1

0.8523*2 = 1.7046
0.7046*2 = 1.4092
0.4092*2 = 0.8184
0.8184*2 = 1.6368
0.6368*2 = 1.2736
0.2736*2 = 0.

(1101001.110110)_2_

1101001.110110 = 0.1101001110110^7
Char = 7+7 = 14
14/2 = 7 R 0
7/2  = 3 R 1
3/2  = 1 R 1
1/2  = 0 R 1

(0|1110|10100111011)_ieee_
